Frequently Asked Questions
What is BotPenguin’s Chatbot Affiliate Program?
BotPenguin's Chatbot Affiliate Program allows individuals to earn commissions by promoting BotPenguin's chatbot platform on social media, offline audiences, or any suitable channel. They get paid when referred customers sign up for BotPenguin’s subscription.
What benefits can I get by becoming chatbot affiliate partner?
By joining BotPenguin's Chatbot Affiliate Program, you can earn a 20% recurring commission for every successful subscription through your referral link.
How can I effectively promote BotPenguin’s generative AI chatbots?
BotPenguin's generative AI chatbots offer advanced features such as custom data set training, URL scraping, FAQs upload, knowledge base utilization, and learning from customer interactions for enhanced conversational capabilities.
What kind of support can I expect if I join the Chatbot Affiliate Program?
If you join BotPenguin's Affiliate Program, you can expect support in converting leads, providing demos and training sessions, retaining customers. In addition to that, you will get a dedicated partner manager too, that will be your one-point troubleshooter.
How do I become an affiliate partner of BotPenguin?
To become an affiliate partner of BotPenguin, you need to sign up with us and get your referral link. Once you have your referral link, you can promote BotPenguin's products through various digital channels and earn commissions for every successful subscription through your referral link.
Who can join BotPenguin’s Chatbot Affiliate Program?
Anyone with an audience can join BotPenguin's Affiliate Program, including bloggers, YouTubers, influencers, web studios, and marketing freelancers.
How can I track my performance in the Chatbot Affiliate Program?
Affiliates can conveniently monitor their Chatbot Affiliate Program performance through a personalized dashboard on their FirstPromoter account, providing insights into referrals and earnings.
